name: Poltergeist (nutrrr)
description:
Poltergeist is a short casual game regarding to possessed an object to be made a trick of people, then you can power boost and can do more trick.  In the game you can enjoy with 2D pixels style and enjoy the instrumentals along the game.

The game was made in a week.

Goal

To trick people until they can’t stand in your haunted mansion anymore.

Control

Use WASD to control your character

Use SPACE to interact/action

Trick people over and over to unlock new power and ability!
